title: Robert Paul, 216 Johnson Street, 10 year old newsy. Found at 11 P. N. with 12 papers near ? Hotel. Been at it 4 years. Often sells until midnight. He and brother make about $1.50 a day. Goes to school little. Sells around the college inn
medium: Photograph, gelatin silver print on paper
credits: Purchased with assistance from Donald Moore 2010
